entry.title: Dutch PHP Conference 2022 - Call for Papers

div.p: We are back for the 16th edition of the Dutch PHP Conference! The 2022 in-person edition features 2 conference days on July 1 & 2, 2022 at RAI Amsterdam. The Call for Papers of Dutch PHP Conference 2022 is now open! You can submit your papers up to and including January 30th and as many proposals as you like, so please start submitting! Check out cfp.phpconference.nl for content briefing and more info.
